name: get_quote_of_the_day
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool world_of_quotes.
Tool description: API returns over 50,000+ famous quotes from over 10,000+ great authors and over 350+ different categories.
API description: This API returns the handpicked quote of the day among 45,000+ quotes based on the highest ratings.
You may also get quote of the day of specific *author* or *category*.

author.description: The author of the quote. Defaults to None.

category.description: The category of the quote, e.g., 'inspirational'. Defaults to 'inspirational'.
